turns.utterance: Have you ever been hiking I want to take my family so we can do trails in the countryside.
turns.response: yes! i love hiking with my baby. I'm a part of Hike It Baby organization

turns.utterance: I didn't know they had those kind of organizations sounds so fun how many people participate and do the group hike in one full day or over a course of a few days?
turns.response: we usually hike for a couple of hours a day with our kids

turns.utterance: I would love to do a hike of that nature something short being kids involved I wouldn't do nothing like The Appalachian Trail which is known to be the longest trail in the world.
turns.response: i've never heard about that trail. where is it located?

turns.utterance: That trial is in the Eastern United States close to Springer mountain in Maine.
turns.response: do you know how long the appalachian trail is?

turns.utterance: Yes when I did research after someone told me about it I found out it is about 2200 miles long I would never be able to do that one lol.
turns.response: WOW!! yes, i'll skip this one lol that's insane!

phrase: i am too old to hike i am in my seventies.
